title: Unthinkable: The Menendez Murders
description: In this Dateline classic, Keith Morrison takes a comprehensive look at the case of Lyle and Erik Menendez who were convicted more than two decades ago of murdering their parents in Beverly Hills. Originally aired on NBC on November 17, 2017.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
